channel.title: Linux on PysKa's Writeups
channel.description: Recent content in Linux on PysKa's Writeups

item.title: Hackthebox Redpanda
item.author: ricardojorge512@hotmail.com (PysKa Ratzinger)
item.description: Foothold /etc/hosts Before anything else, I’ve added the following lines to my /etc/hosts: 10.10.11.170 redpanda.htb So now I can use “redpanda.htb” instead of passing IPs everywhere. NMAP A nmap scan of the top 1000 ports gives us: # Nmap 7.93 scan initiated Tue Sep 27 16:59:36 2022 as: nmap -Pn -sS -A -p1-65535 -O -oN nmap_tcp_all.txt -vvvv redpanda.htb Nmap scan report for redpanda.htb (10.10.11.170) Host is up, received user-set (0.048s latency).

item.title: Hackthebox Shoppy
item.author: ricardojorge512@hotmail.com (PysKa Ratzinger)
item.description: Foothold /etc/hosts Before anything else, I’ve added the following lines to my /etc/hosts: 10.10.11.180 shoppy.htb So now I can use “shoppy.htb” instead of passing IPs everywhere. NMAP A nmap scan of the top 1000 ports gives us: # Nmap 7.93 scan initiated Fri Sep 23 19:28:02 2022 as: nmap -Pn -sS -A --top-ports 1000 -O -oN nmap_tcp_top_1000.txt -vvvv shoppy.htb Nmap scan report for shoppy.htb (10.10.11.180) Host is up, received user-set (0.

item.title: HackMyVM Venus (challenge)
item.author: ricardojorge512@hotmail.com (PysKa Ratzinger)
item.description: Mission 0x01 hacker@venus:~$ ls -lhatr total 44K -rw-r--r-- 1 hacker hacker 807 Aug 4 2021 .profile -rw-r--r-- 1 hacker hacker 3.5K Aug 4 2021 .bashrc -rw-r----- 1 root hacker 2.5K Apr 7 05:55 readme.txt -rw-r----- 1 root hacker 287 Apr 7 05:55 mission.txt -rw-r----- 1 root hacker 16 Apr 7 05:55 .myhiddenpazz drwxr-xr-x 1 root root 4.0K Apr 7 05:55 .. -rw-r----- 1 root hacker 31 Apr 7 06:00 ... -rw-r--r-- 1 root root 0 Apr 8 18:33 .
